summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Rexagon Minecraft Server website iteration 3. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). All new features tested and working correctly: profile settings modal, biography/password endpoints, leaderboard tabs, and profile page layout improvements.

issues: mc-heads.net body image shows broken for non-real Minecraft usernames - expected behavior
Some theme images show broken (404) - expected as sample URLs may not exist

seed_data_creation: Updated biography for rexagon_admin to 'TEST_Bio_Iteration3' via API test
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 3 features working correctly. New profile settings modal with Bio and Password tabs is accessible from navbar dropdown. Leaderboard page has 6 tabs including new 'En Çok Ada Seviyesi' and 'En Çok Dinar'. Profile page has 3-column layout (5/12 left, 4/12 middle, 3/12 right) with taller 280px hero banner and mc-heads.net skin viewer. Market items without images render without empty image box.

mocked_apis.POST /api/market/satin-al/{urun_id}: Returns placeholder minecraft command instead of real server integration

profile_settings_modal.navbar_dropdown_button: PASS - 'Profil Ayarları' button visible in navbar dropdown
profile_settings_modal.modal_opens: PASS - Settings modal opens with dark theme styling
profile_settings_modal.bio_tab: PASS - Bio tab with textarea and save button
profile_settings_modal.password_tab: PASS - Password tab with old/new password fields and change button

backend_new_endpoints.PUT /api/users/biyografi: PASS - Updates user biography when authenticated
backend_new_endpoints.PUT /api/users/sifre: PASS - Changes password with correct old password
backend_new_endpoints.PUT /api/users/sifre_wrong_password: PASS - Rejects wrong old password with 400 status
backend_new_endpoints.GET /api/leaderboard/ada-seviyesi: PASS - Returns user list sorted by ada_seviyesi
backend_new_endpoints.GET /api/leaderboard/dinar: PASS - Returns user list sorted by dinar

profile_page_layout.themes_section: PASS - Middle column shows themes with space-y-5 and rounded-xl
profile_page_layout.skin_viewer: PASS - Right column shows mc-heads.net/body/{username} image

market_page_items.items_without_images: PASS - Render without empty image container
market_page_items.items_with_images: PASS - Use object-contain to show full image
